p.s: Fast creation of valid XML with DTD control.
p.d:
- Easy way to make valid XML : $x-&gt;div( $x-&gt;h1(&quot;Example&quot;), $x-&gt;p(&quot;Hello&quot;), $x-&gt;p(array('class'=&gt;'example'), &quot;World !&quot;) )
- Option to report DTD errors in your XML : Use internal tool or external program [ Require XML_DTD package ] - Use output driver of your choice : Text : return string XML_Tree : return XML_Tree object [ Require XML_Tree package ] - Translate option to quickly transform tags by anothers : ex: Convert your XML to XHTML : &lt;news&gt;&lt;title&gt; Example &lt;/title&gt;&lt;/news&gt; =&gt; &lt;div class=&quot;news&quot;&gt;&lt;h1&gt;&lt;span&gt; Example &lt;/span&gt;&lt;/h1&gt;&lt;/div&gt; - Include a PHP program to quickly transform HTML to FastCreate syntax. [ Require XML_HTMLSax package ] - See examples for more informations : http://lya.fr/pear/XML_FastCreate/tests/ - French Tutorial : http://wiki.lya.fr/doku.php?id=pear_xml_fastcreate
